messages.message:
Hey @melissa.amos looking into this finally and I created a deployment using your Banking app within the shared-workspace-docs and after I run the deployment, I do see provenance data on the page.

Is there anything specific you configured in the deployment or was it a different app if you remember?

It was with this "Banking" app: https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/hub/apps/4af33e59-2769-4e61-af71-97566e105a2d

I didn't configure anything special for the deployment. Only selected an app, put the deployment in the shared Docs workspace, and enabled human review.

I tried running the existing deployment again and still no provenance. I also tried recreating the deployment and still no provenance.
I see provenance on the deployment you just ran. There must be some personal setting you have turned on but i don't know of any like it

Oh I think I found it. Basically you have a locally stored setting "show info annots" as `false` from when we used to show that setting in aihub. The setting has been removed in the UI but your locally stored value was not reset
search for `humanReviewSettings` in your local storage for aihub in the application tab of devtools and you can just delete the currently stored key so it resets
